The higher the amount of bonus Power, the greater the benefits.

9333.name: Guild Control
9333.description: The key to starting and maintaining your very own Guild. Do it by the book!

11048.name: Defeat Insurance Helix
11048.description: Don't be a Defeatist with the Guild Buff Machine that helps reduce the Defeat Penalty.
11048.subtitle: Guild Buff Machine

11049.name: Home Healing Helix
11049.description: Give your Guild a great Healthcare package! When active, provides a handy Buff that regenerates Health for certain Members when in Guild-Aligned Beacons.
11049.subtitle: Guild Buff Machine

11050.name: Building Safety Helix
11050.description: The Buff Machine for Guilds who like to Build and Build high. When active reduces Falling Damage whilst also increasing Block Placement range for Guild or Faction Members.

11051.name: Builder's Buff Helix
11051.description: Build faster with a Builder's Buff Helix. When active, Chisel Durability and Block Placement Speed will be increased for Guild or Faction Members.
11051.subtitle: Guild Buff Machine

11052.name: Brew Extension Helix
11052.description: Enjoy Buffed Up hunts with a Brew Extension Helix. When active, gives a bonus to any active Brew Buffs for Guild or Faction Members.

11053.name: Weapon Augment Durability Helix
11053.description: A Weapon Augment Durability Helix helps your Guild get more from their Weapons. When active, Weapon Augments are more durable.

11054.name: Bonus Consumables Helix
11054.description: Get more out of Food and Brew Crafting with a Bonus Consumables Helix. When active, there is a greater chance of creating bonus Items when Crafting consumables for Guild or Faction Members.

11055.name: Spark and Wear Helix
11055.description: Make Crafting more efficient with a Spark and Wear Helix. When active, Guild or Faction Members will enjoy lower Wear and Spark requirements when using Machines.
11055.subtitle: Guild Buff Machine

11056.name: Grapple and Run Helix
11056.description: Take your expeditions further, faster by getting a Grapple and Run Helix. Guild or Faction Members will enjoy an increase in Run Speed and Grapple Length making exploration a little smoother.

11058.name: Gatherer Healing Helix

11060.name: Hammer Versatility Helix
11060.description: Get more out of Hammers with a Hammer Versatility Helix. When active, Hammers used by Guild or Faction Members will do more Damage to Dirt-type Blocks
11060.subtitle: Guild Buff Machine

9719.description: A Power source specifically designed to add $[STYLE(100 Power,1)] to any Guild Buff Helix Machine. Place with an air gap of around 1m between the Coil and the Helix; when placed correctly a Power Beam will connect the two.
9719.subtitle: Uncommon Crafting Device

9720.name: Chrysominter
9720.description: A Machine which mysteriously rewards Coin to Citizens for their generous Material donations. No one quite knows what becomes of the Materials, or where the Coin originates from.

9721.name: Chrysominter Power Coil
9721.description: A Power source specifically designed to add $[STYLE(100 Power,1)] to any Chrysominter. Place with an air gap of around 1m between the Coil and the Chrysominter; when placed correctly a Power Beam will connect the two. The Chrysominter will take up to 800 Power.

33087.description: A Bag of throwable Snowballs; essential for Defeating decidely seasonal Snow Spitters. Can only be Crafted during Oortmas.

33554.description: An enhanced Totem, capable of destroying Gleambow Meteorites. Can also be used for gathering Resources or with Augments for powerful results. Only Craftable during the Gleambow Racing Event.

32986.description: An intriguing type of Fertiliser which cuts your Farming time considerably. Effective with all Crops.

11062.name: Snowcitizen Happy Head
11062.description: A happy head for a happy Citizen, someone is full of festive cheer! Some of its Ingredients won't be around for long!

11063.description: Not everyone is happy this time of year, show off your inner Oortenezer Scrooge. Some of its Ingredients won't be around for long!

11064.name: Snowcitizen Cute Head
11064.description: Super cute and cheery, top your Snowcitizen off with this treat! Some of its Ingredients won't be around for long!

11065.description: Plump, round and perfectly snowy. Some of its Ingredients won't be around for long!

11066.description: Spread some festive cheer with this decorative Gift Box. Some of its Ingredients won't be around for long!
11066.subtitle: Seasonal Decoration

11067.name: Pink Gift Box
11067.description: I wonder what's inside? Or is it just for decoration? Some of its Ingredients won't be around for long!
11067.subtitle: Seasonal Decoration

11068.name: Teal Gift Box
11068.description: Why should everything be red and green this time of year? Show off your unique side with this decorative Teal Gift Box. Some of its Ingredients won't be around for long!
11068.subtitle: Seasonal Decoration

11070.name: Silver Gift Box
11070.description: Silver usually means second place, but anyone receiving this would be a winner. Some of its Ingredients won't be around for long!

11069.name: Gold Gift Box
11069.description: Nothing says chic like a Gold Gift Box. Some of its Ingredients won't be around for long!
11069.subtitle: Seasonal Decoration

11071.name: Oortmas Tree Top
11071.description: A festive tree top, adorned with a shining star. Use it alone to add a little Seasonal flair or combine it with more Oortmas Tree sections and make a big festive statement. Some of its Ingredients won't be around for long!
11071.subtitle: Seasonal Decoration

11072.name: Oortmas Tree Bottom
11072.description: Citizens have yet to discover where the tradition of Oortmas comes from or in fact if these strange decorated Trees are of the Known Worlds. Never the less, each year they put Tree sections together and experience a wonderful festive feeling. Some of its Ingredients won't be around for long.
11072.subtitle: Seasonal Decoration

11073.name: LED Block
11073.description: Get in the groove with the decorative Block that lights up in a changeable sequenced pattern. Grab a Chisel Forged with Transformation Boon and hit away to choose from 16 different flashing patterns. Each Block lights up in the colour of the material used to make it. Place several LED Blocks together for some truly flashy patterns.
11073.subtitle: Rare Crafted Block

9722.name: Letter Box
9722.description: Allows Citizens to send you Messages in the Chat Channel, even when you're out exploring the Known Worlds.

11341.name: Romantic Vase

33121.name: Extra Damage Slingbow Augment 1
33121.description: Combine with a Slingbow to cause $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Damage Slingbow Augment 1,VAL,ABS)},1)] Extra Damage with each Bolt fired. Augments are temporary and destroyed once out of charge.
33121.subtitle: Common Weapon Augment

33122.name: Extra Damage Slingbow Augment 2
33122.description: Boosts your Bolt Damage by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Damage Slingbow Augment 2,VAL,ABS)},1)] when attached to a Slingbow. Augments are temporary and destroyed once out of charge.
33122.subtitle: Rare Weapon Augment

33123.name: Extra Damage Slingbow Augment 3
33123.description: Deal $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Damage Slingbow Augment 3,VAL,ABS)},1)] more Damage with Bolts when an Augment of this type is attached to a Slingbow. The Augment is destroyed once out of charge.
33123.subtitle: Ultra Rare Weapon Augment

33124.name: Increased Speed Slingbow Augment 1
33124.description: Fire faster than your average Citizen with the Slingbow Augment that increases Fire Rate by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Action Speed Slingbow Augment 1,VAL,ABS)},1)]. Augment is destroyed once out of charge.
33124.subtitle: Common Weapon Augment

33125.name: Increased Speed Slingbow Augment 2
33125.description: Be an even speedier Shot with the Augment that noticeably increases Slingbow Fire Rate by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Action Speed Slingbow Augment 2,VAL,ABS)},1)]. The Augment is destroyed once its charge is lost.
33125.subtitle: Rare Weapon Augment

33126.name: Increased Speed Slingbow Augment 3
33126.description: Fire faster than you can think with the Slingbow Augment that significantly increases Fire Rate by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Action Speed Slingbow Augment 3,VAL,ABS)},1)]. The Augment is destroyed once charge is lost.
33126.subtitle: Ultra Rare Weapon Augment

33127.name: Increased Critical Slingbow Augment 1
33127.description: Fire with confidence thanks to the Slingbow Augment that slightly increases Critical Effect by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Critical Effect Slingbow Augment 1,VAL,ABS)},1)]. The Augment is destroyed once its charge is used up.
33127.subtitle: Common Weapon Augment

33128.name: Increased Critical Slingbow Augment 2
33128.description: Fire with even more confidence! This Augment noticeably boosts Critical Effect by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Critical Effect Slingbow Augment 2,VAL,ABS)},1)] when combined with a Slingbow. The Augment is temporary.
33128.subtitle: Rare Weapon Augment

33129.name: Increased Critical Slingbow Augment 3
33129.description: Full force Slingbow firing with the ultra rare Augment that significantly increases Critical Effect by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Critical Effect Slingbow Augment 3,VAL,ABS)},1)]. Augments are temporary and destroyed once out of charge.
33129.subtitle: Ultra Rare Weapon Augment

33133.name: Faster Projectile Slingbow Augment 1
33133.description: Get your Slingbow Bolts to their Targets faster with a basic Projectile Augment. Increases Projectile Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Projectile Speed Slingbow Augment 1,VAL,ABS)},1)]. The Augment is destroyed once charge is lost.
33133.subtitle: Common Weapon Augment

33134.name: Faster Projectile Slingbow Augment 2
33134.description: The Augment that puts more power behind your Slingbow Bolts making them fly even faster. Increases Projectile Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Projectile Speed Slingbow Augment 2,VAL,ABS)},1)]. Augments are temporary and will be destroyed once charge is lost.
33134.subtitle: Rare Weapon Augment

33135.name: Faster Projectile Slingbow Augment 3
33135.description: Give your Slingbow Bolts even more momentum with this ultra rare and ultra powerful Augment that significantly increases projectile velocity. Increases Projectile Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Projectile Speed Slingbow Augment 3,VAL,ABS)},1)]. The Augment is destroyed once its charge is used up.
33135.subtitle: Ultra Rare Weapon Augment

33130.name: Increased Range Slingbow Augment 1
33130.description: Fire further using the basic Slingbow Augment that slightly increases Weapon Range by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Max Length Slingbow Augment 1,VAL,ABS)},1)]. The Augment is destroyed once its charge is used up.
33130.subtitle: Common Weapon Augment

33131.name: Increased Range Slingbow Augment 2
33131.description: Make your Slingbows longer-range with the Augment that noticeably increases Weapon Range by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Max Length Slingbow Augment 2,VAL,ABS)},1)]. Augments are temporary and are destroyed once charge is lost.
33131.subtitle: Rare Weapon Augment

33132.name: Increased Range Slingbow Augment 3
33132.description: Fire from afar with the ultra rare Augment that significantly increases Slingbow Firing Range by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Max Length Slingbow Augment 3,VAL,ABS)},1)]. Augments are temporary.
33132.subtitle: Ultra Rare Weapon Augment

33453.name: Damage Bomb Augment 1
33453.description: A useful addition to any Bag of Bombs. Temporarily increases Damage dealt by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Damage Bomb Augment 1,VAL,ABS)},1)].
33453.subtitle: Common Weapon Augment

33454.name: Damage Bomb Augment 2
33454.description: A craftable rare Weapon Augment that increases Bomb Damage by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Damage Bomb Augment 2,VAL,ABS)},1)] for a short period of time.
33454.subtitle: Rare Weapon Augment

33455.name: Damage Bomb Augment 3
33455.description: The rarest and most powerful Damage Bomb Augment available. Temporarily increases Damage dealt by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Damage Bomb Augment 3,VAL,ABS)},1)].
33455.subtitle: Ultra Rare Weapon Augment

33459.name: Critical Effect Bomb Augment 1
33459.description: The Bomb Augment that gets Critical results. Add to any Bag of Bombs to temporarily increase Critical Effect by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Critical Effect Bomb Augment 1,VAL,ABS)},1)] for a short period of time.
33459.subtitle: Common Weapon Augment

33460.name: Critical Effect Bomb Augment 2
33460.description: The even better Bomb Augment for more critical Criticals. Use with any Bag of Bombs to increase Critical Effect by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Critical Effect Bomb Augment 2,VAL,ABS)},1)] for a short period of time.
33460.subtitle: Rare Weapon Augment

33461.name: Critical Effect Bomb Augment 3
33461.description: An extremely rare and powerful Bomb Augment of which the Oortarch would be proud. Significantly increases Critical Effect by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Critical Effect Bomb Augment 3,VAL,ABS)},1)] for a short period of time.
33461.subtitle: Ultra Rare Weapon Augment

33462.name: Projectile Speed Bomb Augment 1
33462.description: Pep up your Bombs' Projectile Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Projectile Speed Bomb Augment 1,VAL,ABS)},1)] with the Augment designed to make your Bombs reach their target quicker. All Augments are temporary.
33462.subtitle: Common Weapon Augment

33463.name: Projectile Speed Bomb Augment 2
33463.description: Get your Bombs there faster! Use the rare Augment that increases Bomb travelling Speed by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Projectile Speed Bomb Augment 2,VAL,ABS)},1)] temporarily.
33463.subtitle: Rare Weapon Augment

33464.name: Projectile Speed Bomb Augment 3
33464.description: The rarest, yet speediest option for increasing your Bombs' Projectile Speed. Use with any Bag of Bombs to temporarily increase the speed at which Bombs will reach their target by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Projectile Speed Bomb Augment 3,VAL,ABS)},1)].
33464.subtitle: Ultra Rare Weapon Augment

33465.name: Area Of Effect Bomb Augment 1
33465.description: Give your Bombs a bigger boom with an Area of Effect Augment. Increase the size of area affected by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Area Of Effect Bomb Augment 1,VAL,ABS)},1)] on detonation.
33465.subtitle: Common Weapon Augment

33466.name: Area Of Effect Bomb Augment 2
33466.description: Get a bigger bang from your Bombs over a wider area with this extra explosive Augment. Add to any Bag of Bombs to increase the Area of Effect of those Bombs by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Area Of Effect Bomb Augment 2,VAL,ABS)},1)] for a short period of time.
33466.subtitle: Rare Weapon Augment

33467.name: Area Of Effect Bomb Augment 3
33467.description: Give your Bombs the biggest bang around with this ultra rare and mighty Augment. Increases the Area of Effect of Augmented Bombs by $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Area Of Effect Bomb Augment 3,VAL,ABS)},1)] for a short time.
33467.subtitle: Ultra Rare Weapon Augment

33104.name: Warp Augment
33104.description: Turns a simple Totem into a powerful destination Tool. Combine with a Totem to enable Landing Site selection on new Worlds. Warp Augment are destroyed after each use.
33104.subtitle: Augmentation

33215.description: Turns a simple Totem into a Tool for Reviving Defeated Citizens. Combine with a Totem to temporarily gain the ability to Revive others. The Augment is consumed after each use.
33215.subtitle: Augmentation

33151.name: Cooked Starberry
33151.description: A tasty cooked Starberry. A sweet little snack which restores $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Item Cooked Starberry Initial)},1)] Max Energy when eaten.
33151.subtitle: Common Food

33214.description: A perfectly cooked Glossy Starberry, a tasty way to restore $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Item Cooked Glossy Starberry Initial)},1)] Max Energy.
33214.subtitle: Common Food

33296.name: Cooked Juicy Starberry
33296.description: A cooked sweet and juicy treat which restores $[STYLE(${BUNDLE(Item Cooked Juicy Starberry Initial)},1)] Max Energy.
